B316, Bldg No.1,No.329Yushan W.road,MOCA Creative Industry Park, Panyu Guangzhou,China 511400 86-15018748580 86-20-39292071 86-20-39292498 admin@cnineo.com http://www.cnineo.com
This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Kitchen Fryer Total 12 Product(s) We are professional kitchen fryer factory and supplier in China.We can produce kitchen fryer according to your requirements.More types of kitchen fryer wanted,please contact us right now! View:
Counter Top Gas Fryer TEF-66.R We are one of the top ranked companies manufacturing and selling Counter Top Gas Fryer. This is appliance for kitchen use and operated by electricity or gas. Our Frying machine is run by natural or LPG gas.
Counter Top Electric Fryer TEF-88 Compact, mini-portable fryer suitable for frying in small capacity. The entire Counter Top Electric Fryer can be dismantled in five different parts to facilitate easy handling and cleaning.
Fryer With Cabinet ZH-RC,ZH-TC Fryer With Cabinet is made of 304 stainless steel has no sharp corner and it is very easy to clean.Unique design prevent the water flow into the cooker.
Commercial Electric Pressure Fryer PFE-600 This kind of Electric Pressure fryer is widely used in commercial kitchen such as restaurant and hotel. Seriously quality control ensure the working performance for this kitchen equipment. Meanwhile, it has received CE Approval.
Stainless Steel Electric Pressure Fryer PFE-800 This model of Electric Pressure Fryer has received CE certificate and it meets international hygiene and safety standard.It is equiped with auto oil filter and computer control system.
Gas Fryer EF-72A Gas Fryer is widely used in commercial kitchen such as Restaurant kitchen or hotel kitchen. The body of this gas fryer is made of 304 stainless steel without sharp coner. High efficiency heating element allow food to be fried in short time. It is equipped with electronic ignition to ensure the safety.
Auto-lift Electric Fryer EF-6S . EF-8S Auto-lift Electric Fryer with time setting design for lifting so it no need caretaker,auto control of oil temperature to make sure the food can be cooked evenly. As a commercial kitchen equipment,it enjoy lots of appreciation worldwide.
Electric 1 Tank 1 Basket Fryer EF-81 As a commercial kitchen, Electric Fryer is widely used in Fast Food Restaurant and other kinds of commercial hotel. Basically, it is using for making delicious fast food such as French Fries , Chicken Wings,Chicken Nuggets etc. Meeting internation hygiene and safety standard so it received CE certificate.
Fast Food Electric Fryer EF-4L,EF-6L,EF-8L,EF Electric Fryer is general using on Fast Food Restaurant it is very easy to control. It has received CE Approval and multiple capacity eletric fryer for you to choose.
Electric 2 Tanks 2 Baskets Fryer EF-4L-2,EF-6L-2,EF-8 Electric Fryer is general using on Fast Food Restaurant and it is very easy to control. There are 4 sizes for you to choose and it must be easy fyou to the suitable kitchen equipment among these multiple capacity styles.
Freestanding Electric 2 Tanks 2 Baskets Fryer EF-85 Freestanding Electric Fryer is made of 304 stainless steel and it is equipped with degreases devices. It is widely used in Fast food restaurant and snack kitchen.
Electric Donut Fryer EF-T Electric Donut Fryer is made of 304 stainless steel with CE approval. It is widely used on fast food restaurant and snack kitchen.
